question:
On the playground at school during recess, Monica called Emily a chicken because _ was capable of climbing the ladder.
(1) Monica (2) Emily

At the beauty salon, Angela preferred to work on her eyebrows instead of her eyelashes because the _ were already worked on.
(1) eyebrows (2) eyelashes

The fisherman wanted to put the rock in the pond but the _ was too small.
(1) pond (2) rock

The chopstick were better to eat the noodles with than the fork as the _ was repaired.
(1) chopstick (2) fork

John painted the pole red close to the color of the wall and painted the frame white and now the _ is similar.
(1) frame (2) pole

When Derrick told Christopher about quitting school to provide for their family, _ started panicking.
(1) Derrick (2) Christopher

Lawrence liked watching foreign movies with subtitles unlike Jason because _ appreciated the original language of the film.
(1) Lawrence (2) Jason

Judy bought new brushes to paint the etched glasses crack but it didn't fit. The _ was too wide.
(1) brush (2) crack

Brian was jealous of Brett's new car because _ couldn't afford to buy a new car.
(1) Brian (2) Brett

The battle was less fierce than the great war, because the _ lasted one year.
(1) battle (2) war
